summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account for May 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and fees, highlighting significant outgoing transactions and the account balance at the end of the month.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the business checking account detailed in the document, with various transactions listed under his name.

persons.name: Paul Nlonis
persons.context: Paul Nlonis is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: M Rites S McCorquodale
persons.context: M Rites S McCorquodale is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein made several outgoing money transfers to M Rites S McCorquodale's account during May 2016.

events.title: End of Month Account Summary
events.description: The document summarizes the account balance and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account as of May 31, 2016.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account as of May 31, 2016, was $66,914.88.
Significant outgoing transactions included payments to M Rites S McCorquodale and various preauthorized debits.
The document includes details of multiple transactions, including checks and electronic transfers, throughout May 2016.
